name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.input.lineinputformat.linespermap
description:
When using NLineInputFormat, the number of lines of input data
  to include in each split.

name: dfs.client.max.block.acquire.failures
description: Maximum failures allowed when trying to get block information from a specific datanode.

name: mapreduce.job.ubertask.maxreduces
description:
Threshold for number of reduces, beyond which job is considered
  too big for the ubertasking optimization.  CURRENTLY THE CODE CANNOT SUPPORT
  MORE THAN ONE REDUCE and will ignore larger values.  (Zero is a valid max,
  however.)  Users may override this value, but only downward.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.max.disk.errors
description:
During a block move from a source to destination disk, we might
      encounter various errors. This defines how many errors we can tolerate
      before we declare a move between 2 disks (or a step) has failed.
